summary: A detective and his team must rescue 8 people trapped in a factory by the twisted serial killer known as Jigsaw.
cast: Tobin Bell|Shawnee Smith|Donnie Wahlberg|Erik Knudsen|Franky G|Glenn Plummer|Emmanuelle Vaugier|Beverley Mitchell|Timothy Burd|Dina Meyer|Lyriq Bent|Noam Jenkins|Tony Nappo|Kelly Jones|Vincent Rother|Linette Doherty|Gretchen Helbig|Kofi Payton|John Fallon|Ho Chow|Conrad Coates|James Gallanders|Sam Malkin|Robin Ward|Cary Elwes|Leigh Whannell
title: Saw II
